content:
@Ben Levy and @sean zitello , which servers were you able to test with?

  • Audacious Inquiry
  • Epic
  • NextGen
  • Symptomatic

I have some results in Query https://docs.google.com/document/d/1Bdo9MIrz5ihm00iK8bnzi01YYJEcOz3sNYs2GUP4hPs/edit?usp=sharing
I could Read Capability Statements from all, MeasureReports from all., Measures from some,.
I could only POST to SmileCDR last I tried, though it think I could probably break Bundles out for Azure as it does not have transactions enabled

Michael Donnelly said:

Do you have time to give it a shot with NextGen and/or Epic and/or Symptomatic?

Not sure how this will look:
image.png GET POST
Server Capability Measure MeasureReport Location Organization MeasureReport2 Bundle

Epic yes no yes w/rules no no yes 404 Response
SmileCDR yes yes yes yes yes yes yes
NextGen yes yes yes yes yes yes 405 not permitted
Azure yes yes yes yes yes yes forbidden
